snippet: In 2012, Somali pirate attacks dropped by almost 80 percent compared with a year earlier.
abstract: International Maritime Bureau, Oceans Beyond Piracy and Maritime Piracy Humanitarian Response Program report that in 2012 pirate attacks off coast of West Africa for first time exceeded those by pirates based in Somalia, with attacks near Somalia dropping 80 percent from 3,863 attacks to 851 attacks and West African attacks numbering 966.
lead_paragraph: In 2012, Somali pirate attacks dropped by almost 80 percent compared with a year earlier.

headline.main: West African Piracy Exceeds Somali Attacks, Report Says
headline.print_headline: West Africa Tops Somalia in Piracy
